names.name: Ehyeh
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Kether, representing existence and the highest aspect of the divine.

names.name: Metatron
names.description: Known as the Chancellor of Heaven, the angel of life, and the king of angels.

names.name: Chayyot Ha Kadesh
names.description: Represent the highest order of angels, associated with divine knowledge and presence.

names.name: Crown
names.description: Symbolizes the topmost part, representing the highest state of perfection and the divine will.

names.name: Yechidah
names.description: The highest level of the soul, representing oneness with God.

names.name: Eheieh Asher Eheieh
names.description: Signifies the most concealed of God's attributes.
